notes: Xclusive Organics offers DropCare® SRF (Saccharomyces/Rice Ferment Filtrate), a premium skin health ingredient created through rice fermented with yeast and meticulously filtered. Provides anti-aging benefits and hydration support. Represents high-quality fermentation technology combining traditional rice fermentation with modern biotechnology.

Xclusive Organics offers DropCare® SRF (Saccharomyces/Rice Ferment Filtrate), a premium skin health ingredient created through fermentation of rice with Saccharomyces yeast. The ferment is meticulously filtered to ensure purity and consistency. DropCare® SRF provides anti-aging benefits, supports skin hydration, and promotes overall skin health through microbiome-friendly mechanisms. The combination of rice nutrients and yeast metabolites creates a synergistic effect for enhanced skin benefits. Suitable for premium anti-aging and hydration formulations.
